summary: ¿Qué opina el co-creador de Ms. Marvel sobre la película Captain Marvel?
title: ¿Qué opina el co-creador de Ms. Marvel sobre la película Captain Marvel?
body:
¿Qué opina el co-creador de Ms. Marvel sobre la película Captain Marvel?

Gerry Conway, co-creador junto a John Buscema de Ms. Marvel, ha hablado recientemente, durante una entrevista con City Net Magazine, sobre la película protagonizada por la superheroína que se estrenará en 2019.

El artista de cómics afirma que nunca pensó que sus creaciones tendrían tanto éxito, porque no sólo se trata de dicho personaje, en la actualidad. Esto es lo que comentó durante la charla,…

View On WordPress

summary: Captain Marvel: Samuel L. Jackson verrà de-invecchiato per l'intero film
title: Captain Marvel: Samuel L. Jackson verrà de-invecchiato per l'intero film
body:
Captain Marvel: Samuel L. Jackson verrà de-invecchiato per l’intero film

Sappiamo ormai da tempo che in Captain Marvel compariranno le versioni più giovani di Nick Fury, Phil Coulson e Ronan L’Accusatore, ma per quanto per gli ultimi due un ringiovanimento sia abbastanza semplice da realizzare, per il grandissimo Samuel L.Jackson la questione si fa un po’ più complicata, almeno stando a molto discussioni sul web.

La cosa ha perfettamente senso, visto che il film sarà…

summary: Kevin Feige Hints at the Future of the MCU and Movies Going Through 2024
title: Kevin Feige Hints at the Future of the MCU and Movies Going Through 2024
body:
Kevin Feige Hints at the Future of the MCU and Movies Going Through 2024

While everyone is focused on the upcoming Marvel Cinematic Universe movies such as Captain Marvel and the untitled Avengers 4, there are a lot of movies in the works and it sounds like they have several in planning that takes us through 2024.

In an interview with Birth.Movies.Death, they ask Kevin Feige about revealing the future movies like they did with Phase 3 and again he explains how they…

summary:
My favourite cat flerken is going to be in Captain Marvel 🙀
This is at the bottom of that picture Brie Larson tweeted 
And Sam...
body:
My favourite cat flerken is going to be in Captain Marvel 🙀

This is at the bottom of that picture Brie Larson tweeted

And Sam Jackson posted this picture of a Captain Marvel t-shirt with a “cat” taking up like half of the picture.

Anyways, I love Chewie and I can’t wait to see her in this movie (Also I want to see that interaction from the comics between Rocket and Chewie that was great).

summary: Captain Marvel - Ringiovanimento di 25 anni per Samuel L. Jackson e Clark Cregg
title: Captain Marvel - Ringiovanimento di 25 anni per Samuel L. Jackson e Clark Cregg
body:
#CaptainMarvel - Ringiovanimento di 25 anni per Samuel L. Jackson e Clark Cregg

Le riprese di Captain Marvel sono ufficialmente finite, ma ora online sono trapelate alcune informazioni circa la post-produzione del film. Nel dettaglio, la notizia riguarda il ringiovanimento di 25 anni a cui saranno sottoposti Samuel L. Jackson e Clark Gregg.

Proprio Kevin Feigeha rivelato che i due attori saranno sottoposti a un ringiovanimento digitale, tecnica già utilizzata in casa Marvel…

summary: Brie Larson unveils on Twitter end of filming Captain Marvel - Amwal Al ghad
title: Brie Larson unveils on Twitter end of filming Captain Marvel - Amwal Al ghad
excerpt: Academy Award-winning actress and star of Marvel’s first female-led superhero movie, Brie Larson posted on Sunday a photo to Twitter to announce that Captain Marvel had officially wrapped filming on 6 July.
